title: AgentHub
about: Full-stack, multi-agent AI assistant platform for chat, documents, SQL, and research workflows using LangChain, LangGraph, FastAPI, and Streamlit, enabling configurable, production-ready agent orchestration.

title: RAG-Medical-Chatbot
about: RAG-based medical assistant that retrieves trusted clinical context and generates helpful answers using embeddings, vector search, and LLMs; built with LangChain, FAISS, and Streamlit.

title: AI-Doctor
about: AI-powered medical assistant offering symptom triage and health insights with classic ML and LLM pipelines, emphasizing explainable predictions and structured inputs for faster screening support.

title: OMR-Sheet-Evaluation-System
about: Developed cost-effective OMR System using OpenCV, automating grading through advanced image processing for accurate evaluations with clear, actionable feedback for students and administrators.

title: Anime-Recommender-System
about: RAG-powered anime recommender using LangChain pipelines, embeddings, and vector search, deployed with FastAPI backend and Streamlit interface.

title: AI-PDF-Chatbot-and-Agent
about: Chat with PDFs using RAG and tools; supports multi-document ingestion, chunking, embeddings, and agent tools via LangChain and Groq, deployed with Streamlit for seamless interactive exploration.

title: AI-Agent-Chatbot
about: Modular agentic chatbot with tool-use, retrieval, and function calling via LangChain, enabling goal-oriented conversations, web/retrieval actions, and extensible skills for real-world automation.

title: T20-World-Cup-Data-Analytics
about: Created a Power BI report to identify the top 11 players for a T20 cricket team by scraping data from ESPNCricinfo and evaluating performance metrics.

title: Car-Parking-Space-Counter
about: The Car Parking Space Counter uses computer vision to detect and count parked vehicles, providing real-time updates on available parking spaces.

title: Portfolio-Website
about: Responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for optimal performance and user experience.

title: Diabetes-Prediction
about: This project predicts diabetes using features like pregnancies, insulin, age, and BMI, sourced from Kaggle and employing a random forest classifier for accurate prediction.

title: Forest-Fire-Prediction
about: Flask-based regression app predicting Fire Weather Index (FWI) from Algerian forest data, featuring cleaned pipeline and saved model artifacts for reliable, reproducible inference.

title: Download-GeeksforGeeks-Articles
about: Developed Streamlit app enables users to download GeeksForGeeks articles as PDFs using their article URLs.

title: Movie-Review
about: Movie review website that allows users to search for movies and view their details, including ratings and overviews.

title: QR-Code-Generator
about: Created Streamlit app allows users to generates a QR code for a given URL.

title: Game-2048
about: 2048 is a sliding puzzle game where players merge tiles to reach the 2048 tile.

title: Simon-Game
about: Classic Simon game implementation where players must remember and repeat sequences of colors.

title: Stopwatch-Timer
about: This C++ programming project creates a stopwatch/timer application with start, stop, and reset functionalities.

title: Rock-Paper-Scissors
about: This C programming project implements a simple Rock-Paper-Scissors game where the user plays against the computer.

title: Guessing-Game
about: This C programming project involves creating a number guessing game where the player tries to guess a randomly generated number within a specified range.
